issue.title: [C++] Bump versions of bundled libraries
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9090](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9090). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We should bump the versions of bundled dependencies, wherever possible, to ensure that users get bugfixes and improvements made in those third-party libraries.
